entry.title: 001-My firt hexo blog
entry.content:
creating blogs with hexo

  1. choose themes

    choose a theme and then clone it.

    You can find many themes on hexo theme:

    [hexo theme]: https://hexo.io/themes/“hexo theme”

    Clone from the repository:

    git clone theme-example-link themes/themeName

  2. config

    Change the settings in the file _config.yml to enable the theme:

    theme: yourTheme

  3. blogs

    Creating blogs:

    hexo new "your blog title"

    Then you can find a new file created under the directory source. And enjoy writing now.

  4. deploy

    Deploy your local blogs to the server:

    hexo cleanhexo ghexo d

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
